სიჯისი - “საქართველოს ცენტრალური კავშირგ: Sijis - “Central Communications Corporation of Georgia” is the first private telecommunications company established in Georgia. It was created by the Greek and Georgian parties in 1995 and started operating in St. in Rustavi. Initially, the company, St. The population of Rustavi was offered a fixed telephone service with an Alcatel digital station, which included 3000 subscriber numbers and had World Release software. Since 2009, Sijisi has offered Internet services with DSL technology to the residents of Rustavi. At the same time, the company started the construction of fiber optic network and since 2010, it was the first to provide fiber optic internet to Rustavi. This was followed by the launch of cable television and the increase of the area of operation throughout Kvemo Kartli. The development of the company was followed by an increase in the number of employees, which increased from 25 to 100 during these years, and more than 90% of whom are from Rustavi, which is one of the important issues for the company in taking care of the city.
დღესდღეობით, გარდა ზემოთ აღნიშნული პროდუ: Nowadays, in addition to the products mentioned above, Sijisi subscribers Offers wireless internet and digital (IP) television.
შეუკვეთეთ სიჯისის ოპტიკური ინტერნეტი ან/: Order Sijis optical Internet and/or IP TV - at the office, Friendship Avenue #2, call us: 25 00 00 or 0 800 200 200. Calls from mobile networks are free.

გაცნობებთ, რომ 01.10.2022-დან სატელევიზი: We inform you that from 01.10.2022 TV channels РТР Плената; Russia 24; TV XXI; Koleydoscope TV; Дикая охота HD; Совершенно Секретно; Россия-Культура; В гостях у сказки; Central Television; Дикая Рыбалка HD; wild World Fashion Channel; first entertainment; 9 Волна; 7D7; Ukraine 24 will no longer be available on CGC TV
ტარიფები ფიზიკური პირებისთვის: 2022 წლის: Tariffs for individuals: from March 1, 2022, the Internet tariffs for individual subscribers will change, namely: 1. Package optical exclusive 20 MB/s - canceled 2. Package optical standard 30 MB/s - the price will be 24 GEL instead of 39 GEL 3. Package Optical Premium 50 MB/s - the price becomes 40 GEL instead of 49 GEL 4. Package optical business 60 MB/s - the speed becomes 70 MB/s and the price is 60 GEL instead of 79 GEL Subscribers will be able to activate the optical standard of 24 GEL for a single payment of 20 GEL. Along with changes in tariffs, new bundle packages are created in the company, the validity period of which is determined for life, until the next update of standard tariffs. New bundle packages that will be launched from March 1, 2022: 1. Bundle 1 – 30 MB/s Internet + IPTV package basic - for 26 GEL 2. Bundle 2 – 30 MB/s Internet + IPTV package complete - for 32 GEL 3. Bundle 3 – 50 MB/s Internet + IPTV package basic - for 36 GEL 4. Bundle 4 - 50 MB/s Internet + IPTV package complete - for 42 GEL 5. Bundle 5 - 70 MB/s Internet + IPTV package basic - for 56 GEL 6. Bundle 6 - 70 Mb/s Internet + IPTV package complete - for 66 GEL Based on the changes mentioned above, the subscribers will automatically switch to the new package corresponding to the current package. All optical exclusive individual subscribers will automatically switch to optical standard All optical business individual subscribers will automatically switch to the new optical business All optical exclusive 18 GEL promotional individual subscribers will automatically switch to the 20 GEL optical standard promotional package All 24 GEL promotional individual subscribers will automatically switch to the 26 GEL bundle Individual subscribers of all 29 GEL promotions on the package will be automatically transferred to the 32 GEL bundle package. The above conditions apply only to individual subscribers. Both new and existing subscribers can use the terms of the bundle. Thank you for your cooperation.
